title: Plantera's Tentacle
summaries: Plantera is a Hardmode boss that can be fought in the Underground Jungle after all three mechanical bosses (The Destroyer, Skeletron Prime, and The Twins) have been defeated. Plantera drops a Temple Key upon defeat, allowing access to the Jungle Temple.
While Plantera is alive, her exclusive music Plantera will play. When Otherworldly music is enabled, the track Plantera (Otherworldly) will play instead.

statistics.Damage: 60/138/206
statistics.Max Life: 1000/2000/2550
statistics.KB Resist: 0%/10%/20%
